title: Rating Document
description: Schema for the rating document in the NoSQL database

user_id.description: Unique identifier for the user who made the rating

status.description: Status of the anime for the user (e.g., watching, completed, on_hold, dropped, plan_to_watch)

score.description: Rating given by the user to the anime

num_watched_episodes.description: Number of episodes watched by the user for the anime
